product_name: The North Face Cheakamus Triclimate 3-in-1 Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: Stylish and versatile, the Cheakamus Triclimate 3-in-1 insulated jacket by The North Face offers complete weather protection in an adaptive design and streamlined fit for season-long performance. 3 different ways to wear the system: wear shell jacket and zip-in liner jacket together for maximum protection or wear either piece on its own as weather warrants. HyVent(TM) 2-layer construction is waterproof, windproof and breathable; fully sealed seams prevent moisture from seeping through. Powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately). Chest pocket; zip handwarmer pockets; wrist pocket with goggles cloth; internal goggles pocket. Cinch adjustable hem and rip-and-stick wrist cuffs help seal out cold air and retain valuable warmth; core vents let you control airflow and your comfort. Fully adjustable, removable hood ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit. The North Face Cheakamus Triclimate zip-in/out liner jacket uses Heatseeker(TM) 100g polyfiber insulation to keep you warm without inhibiting movement. Liner jacket has zippered handwarmer pockets and an internal media pocket for convenience when wearing liner on its own. Easy zip-in system mates the liner jacket and shell jacket together for added warmth and allows easy reach-in access to the shell's interior features.
short_description: Stylish and versatile, the Cheakamus Triclimate 3-in-1 insulated jacket by The North Face offers complete weather protection in an adaptive design and streamlined fit for season-long performance.
